segments.text: My doctor said that I need a chest X-ray .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just take your clothes off from the waist up and put this gown on , with the opening in the back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should I do after that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to come over here and face this plate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I standing the right way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will need your arms raised to shoulder height .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I doing this the right way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything you are doing is perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am just getting behind this screen . You need to take a deep breath , hold it , and then breathe normally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that all there is to it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get dressed as soon as the film is processed . We will be all done here .
segments.speaker: S2
